attributes.action: Legalise cannabis for medical and recreational purposes
attributes.additional_details: There are many reason the waste of tax payers money, waste of police time and a waste of time to everyone you stop for it, many other country's have done so with great success and a massive boost in tax. The real question is why is this taking so long in the UK
attributes.background: We want you to legalise cannabis for medical and recreational purposes or atleast allow a public vote

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Legalise cannabis in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614503
